job.title: (Remote) Senior PHP/React Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
100% Remote Full Time Direct Hire
Job Title:
Senior Software Engineer
Salary:
$140k - $170k
Job Location:
100% Remote
Requirements:
8+ years development experience - Good experience with PHP and Javascript (React is desired)
We are a SaaS company that works with banking, healthcare, real estate and other industries to help execute sales more quickly and efficiently. Our platform integrates will all email and CRM applications to help provide real time analytics and track ROI on investments.
We need an experienced Software Developer to create innovative and efficient software solutions and have a focus on full stack development using PHP and Javascript/React.
Top Reasons to Work with Us
Competitive salary ($140k - $170k)
Full Benefits (health, dental, vision, etc.)
Strong GlassDoor rating
Very low turnover rate
Stable and growing company
Huge opportunity for career and personal growth
What You Will Be Doing
Architecture and development
Improve and contribute to the scalability of existing systems and applications
Work on complex engineering problems
Produce high-quality, commented and documented code that will easily be maintainable
What You Need for this Position
8+ years software development experience
PHP (Yii is a plus)
JavaScript
React is desired (or Angular)
Node is a plus
HTML/CSS
BS in CS (or related) is preferred
So, if you are a (Remote) Senior PHP/React Engineer with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Danny.Herries@Optello.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : DH1-1617295 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Danny Herries - Lead Recruiter - Optello
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
Optello is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
